Menubar component

A menu that is visually persistent is a menubar. A menubar is typically horizontal and is often used to create a menu bar similar to those found near the top of the window in many desktop applications, offering the user quick access to a consistent set of commands.

It can be seen as a composite of menuitems and dropdown menus

  • Menu bar using lrtiste
  • Demo: menubar component using lrtiste

Menu bar using lrtiste

As a menu bar would be a set of grouped actions, it may not be relevant/easy to have it working without Javascript and we are going to consider for this example that Javascript is available.

There is a specification draft on a eventually new menu html element whose read might help to understand what is expected for such a component.
